data.message:
ROOTS...

You have always been there for us
I only wish that our Faith we could trust
If you could heal our troubled minds
We would not feel so broken inside
Why must we sit here and wait for you?
We are tired and scared, severe damage accrued
It has built up, this pain that we all go through
We all feel degraded, all lies and no truth
Cant even believe in the people we see
Our sisters and brothers, our family our tree
Dried withered leaves,our roots are divided
By religion, by race, no pain has subsided
We're angry and hurt He has poisoned our tree
So much on our minds
Please set us free
And save us from satan who clouds our beliefs

History has played an upsetting part
We are no longer there, it has shattered our hearts
Our ancestors taught us the ways of their world
spread all their hate to our boys and our girls
It was our job to mend and build bridges they've burned
The public says nothing, the News leads the herd
Please Lord feed knowledge and care for eachother
Please fix us and help us to love one another..

Hope michelle Francis 7-5-17
